ygData.subject: RE: Why was total-bandwidth-usage-KB-sec removed from H3
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi Søren, I wasn t involved in the decision, but as I recall the feature was considered somewhat misleading. While it kinda, sorta worked, you could get
